section.p: Looking outside, you see three heads flying around in the moonlight. You remember seeing a play about these flying-head goblins. The hero of the play destroyed them by attacking their bodies. You take a skewer from the wall and pierce the heart of each in turn. From outside come three terrible sighs and the heads drop to the ground, quite dead.
